lead_paragraph: Claims that the ship was boarded last week by separatists are probably a cover to lend legitimacy to a kidnapping for ransom, a maritime security expert said.

headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Separatist Groups Deny Any Role in Ship’s Hijacking
headline.main: Nigeria: Separatist Groups Deny Any Role in Ship’s Hijacking

snippet: Claims that the ship was boarded last week by separatists are probably a cover to lend legitimacy to a kidnapping for ransom, a maritime security expert said.
